title: The "per-side offset" locked screen seems to not be functioning properly anymore

embed.description: As Per-Side offset used to shift a bit in the direction so u would see more, it no longer does this and is just the same as the fixed offset.

body: As i am one of the few(?) locked screen players, it really improved my gameplay when this feature was introduced. Though right now, as of patch 6.2, it no longer functions properly and is just the same as the usual fixed offset. (might have to do with the introduction of Jhin?) Im struggling A LOT on red-side games due to this again.. :(

replies.body:
Hey TIMELICIOUS, 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and have been working on a fix. This should be resolved in 6.3.
